paras.heading: Risk Factors
paras.content: the company has signed a 10-year exclusive licensing agreement with Qualcomm . the agreement will allow the company to use the MAX-D technology in a variety of applications . it will also be used in the development of the company's own mobile app .

paras.heading: Quantitative and Qualitative Disclosures About Market Risk
paras.content: a number of forward-looking statements reflect our views with respect to future events and financial condition . the company believes that Max Sound HD Audio Technology is a game changer for several vertical markets . a recent accounting pronouncement deemed either immaterial or not applicable .

paras.heading: Changes in and Disagreements with Accountants on Accounting and Financial Disclosure
paras.content: the company has accumulated losses and a working capital deficit of $12,652,995 . the ultimate impact of the COVID-19 pandemic is unknown and cannot be predicted with confidence . if the company is unable to obtain additional funds, it may not be able to continue operations .
